finding.title: Cross-Site Scripting

description.p: An open redirect vulnerability in NetMon allows an attacker to redirect users to arbitrary websites, e.g. to conduct phishing attacks; see CVE-2014-130000.
This vulnerability might also be used in conjunction with and to compromise the NetMon host in a spear phishing campaign.

technicaldescription.p: This link points at NetMon, but the user is redirected to google.com:

finding.recommendation: Update NetMon to the latest version, where this issue is fixed.
